website_summaries.verdict: Both the forklift and tow truck models feature a lifelike range of motion and functionality, and are well-worth the time it will take to properly assemble your vehicle of choice.
pros: Twist rear peg to steer tires as it rolls
Functional forklift with pallet and cargo
cons: You can’t enjoy both awesome models at once

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego set!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 7-year-old for his birthday about a month ago. He's already assembled and taken it apart six times, including the B model tow truck. It's his first Technic set and he couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Stac

customer_reviews.title: Advance Legos
customer_reviews.text: Our son in-law grew up loving LEGO. The love is still there. The LEGO Technic are the advanced LEGO sets, so these are always a sure hit for a Christmas present
customer_reviews.author: lilly

customer_reviews.title: Great build
customer_reviews.text: This was my first LEGO Technic build. It was fun and took me about 4 hours. The directions are clear and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: RVS053063

customer_reviews.title: Great fun learning experience for kids that likes trucks
customer_reviews.text: This set is a pretty good demonstration of how the engine, axles and drive shaft work together, and plus it's a large sturdy play toy, and a lot of fun to put together.
customer_reviews.author: KoKo

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I'm not big on Lego's, but my husband is so I try to get him a nice Technic set every holiday. This one was for his birthday and he was very happy with it. All the pieces were there, it was sealed and exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: PeggySue

customer_reviews.title: More for older children
customer_reviews.text: This has many parts and is not a toy for younger kids. I would not have purchased if I knew it was going to be more complicated than other Lego products I have purchased for my oldest grandson in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Moody

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: It Lego's what more needs to be said .. Grandkids love them
customer_reviews.author: Voodoo Jester

customer_reviews.title: Its legos, you know the rest.
customer_reviews.text: It's a Lego product, so you just piece it together
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Limbocker

customer_reviews.title: Very complex to install
customer_reviews.text: Directions were somewhat difficult to interpret even for me, the adult. My grandson was frustrated and gave up on putting it together. Lesson learned on my part to make sure we get him Lego's for exactly his age. he is 10 and this was to much for him. Boo...
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Adult Lego Fan
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a fun Christmas gift for my partner. Assembly was quite easy for him (although he is an experienced Lego aficionado). He enjoyed the many intricate aspects of the model, such as the working pistons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandson gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 10 yr old grandson. He really enjoyed building this. He likes the 2n1 and 3n1 LEGO sets. He builds each one then decides which one he wants to keep together.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Grateful Grandson
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandson (9) who is a Lego fan but this is his first Technic set. He is very much looking forward to increasing his skills and learning the basics of mechanics.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: building this was great it took us some time but the fork lift turned out great. everything is functional really a great lego set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged package
customer_reviews.text: the box came very damaged and broken. The parts inside seem to be okay. This is a birthday present. Not super happy to give a damaged gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for young LEGO builders... I would say for children 11 and above!
customer_reviews.text: I had nothing to do... my 10 year old grandson was thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: debbie bohan

customer_reviews.title: Good build
customer_reviews.text: Great build. Fun to tinker with and at the moment it has the jokers lowrider on the forks
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha C.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Build
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fun build. One star off, because Amazon put label on Lego box. Was shipped in the typical Amazon Prime box. No need for a label on the Lego box. For collecting, ruins the value. It is like they were going to ship just the Lego box, labeled it, then change their mind, and put it in the typical prime box. Strange. See photo.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego set for kids during family party
customer_reviews.text: Lego is always a good building toy for kids to stay away from smart devices. We have a few Star War and Technic sets we bought over the years when they were on sale. Received this 2 in 1 Technic set in time for family get together. My daughter, 13, and nephew also 13 spend a little over 1 hour together to put this set together for tow truck. Last time they finished a Star War set. Recommended for any adult or kids.
customer_reviews.author: HolyCow

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner Set
customer_reviews.text: I got this Technic set for my 11 year old son who is just getting into Technic. He wanted a more advanced set and this one was perfect to get him started. It comes in at around 600 pieces (592 to be exact) and is for ages 9-16. It can be built as either a tow truck or a forklift but not both at the same time. What makes this more realistic and for older LEGO fans is the design is more detailed. More pieces more in different directions and the designs are more true to design. My son loves that it looks so real and moves up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Cher Kachelmuss

customer_reviews.title: Love LEGOS!
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. I still haven't finished this build thanks to our 4-year-old. I got this thinking he would be able to enjoy it with me but he gets so excited he just wants to make whatever with the pieces and keeps taking everything apart. I'm not sure we had the Technic sets when I was growing up, it was more just the traditional blocks with a few one-off parts here and there. We were lucky enough to get some Star Wars type space ship back then and we were more than excited. I have always loved the detailed instructions that LEGO provides. They are far superior to anything their competitors have and that is important for little kids.
customer_reviews.author: J1976

customer_reviews.title: Great playing LEGO truck
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set to build and play with. The nice thing is that it can be built in two different models and transforming from one model to the other is relatively simple (simpler than on other Technic sets where you need to take everything apart). My kid has been playing with the forklift a lot, moving other LEGO builds around his desk and reorganizing his LEGO shelf. I think this is one of his favorites and he loves playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gafton

product_meta.title: LEGO Technic Heavy Duty Forklift 42079 Building Kit (592 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Take your LEGO Technic experience to another level with the 42079 Heavy Duty Forklift truck, featuring a detailed driver’s cab, orange warning beacon, large tires and high-reach forks. Maneuver the vehicle to move the engine cylinders, raise and tilt the forks, and operate the rear-wheel steering to lift and transport the pallet to its destination. This 2-in-1 car toy also includes a cargo barrel with a hazard-warning label, and comes with a yellow and blue color scheme, and stickers for additional detailing. Rebuild this advanced builder set to create a powerful Tow Truck.
feature_bullets: Build a realistic Forklift Truck with steering, moving piston engine and high-reach forks with this advanced building set!
This 2-in-1 toy forklift model can be rebuilt into a tow truck with driver cab, tow crane ad moving/lifting arm
Heavy Duty Forklift replica measures over 7-inch (18cm) high, 12-inch (33cm) long and 4-inch (12cm) Tow Truck measures over 5-inch (13cm) high, 12-inch (32cm) long and 4-inch (12cm) wide
592 pieces – Advanced building STEM toy for boys and girls aged between 9 and 16 and for fans and big kids of all ages
The LEGO Technic Heavy Duty Forklift 42079 technical toy can be built together with all other original LEGO Technic sets and LEGO building bricks for creative construction

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars221 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
